translation.en: -Hello? -Sonny, it's your dad. You asleep?
translation.fr:
- Allô ?
- Sonny, c'est ton père. Tu dors ?

translation.en: No. Hey, man. I was exercising.
translation.fr: Non, je faisais de la muscu.

translation.en: -Bullshit. You were sleeping. -I wasn't.
translation.fr:
- Je sais que tu dormais.
- Non.

translation.en: This kid won't stop lying to me. You still act like you're 6.
translation.fr:
Tu mens comme tu respires.
Six ans d'âge mental...

translation.en: Yeah, okay, Dad. I act like I'm 6.
translation.fr:
C'est ça, papa.
J'ai six ans d'âge mental.

translation.en: Found a job yet where you work more than one day a week?
translation.fr:
Tu peux pas travailler
comme tout le monde ?

translation.en: I've been looking.
Looking won't pay the rent.
All the money I won from the cab accident...
translation.fr: L'argent de mon accident de taxi

translation.en: ...is kicking ass in the stock market, so relax.
translation.fr:
fait un malheur en bourse.
Relax !

translation.en: -Don't blow it on worthless crap. -I won't.
translation.fr:
- Claque-le à bon escient.
- Mais oui.

translation.en: You should spend it on your bar exam.
You're the lawyer. I ain't taking a bar exam.
translation.fr:
C'est toi, l'avocat.
Négatif, le droit.

translation.en: I got too much other shit going on.
I don't know what happened to you.
How're things going with your girlfriend, Vanessa?
translation.fr:
Ça va avec ta petite copine,
Vanessa ?

translation.en: Things are going fine.
Shit! You turned off the alarm clock again.
translation.fr:
- Tu as encore éteint le réveil !
- Non ! Enfin, oui...

translation.en: No! I mean, yes, I did, but I thought you needed more sleep.
translation.fr:
- Tu as encore éteint le réveil !
- Non ! Enfin, oui... Il fallait que tu dormes.

translation.en: I shouldn't have stayed here. That was a jerk thing to do.
translation.fr:
J'aurais mieux fait de rentrer.
T'es trop nul !

translation.en: Why are you going to work? It's Sunday.
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tu t'en vas ?
On est dimanche.

translation.en: I'm not going to work. I'm going to brunch with potential clients.
translation.fr:
Je bosse pas. Je déjeune
avec des clients potentiels.

translation.en: That's how a party planner gets business, by making contacts.
translation.fr:
Pour vendre des réceptions,
il faut des contacts.

translation.en: Meet with me. I'll order in from Cozy's. We'll have fun.
translation.fr:
Contacte-moi.
Je commande chez Cozy. Ça sera fun.

translation.en: I am sick of Cozy's. You order in from there all the time.
translation.fr:
Ras-le-bol, Cozy.
Tu commandes tout le temps là-bas.

translation.en: The delivery guy's your best friend.
He happens to be pretty damn nice.
This is a rough patch in my life.
Syracuse is 0 and 3. And I got those medical problems.
translation.fr:
Syracuse a perdu 3 fois.
Et j'ai des ennuis de santé.

translation.en: Medical problems?
A cab runs over your foot two years ago. You're hospitalized one night.
translation.fr:
Ton taxi, c'était il y a deux ans.
Une nuit d'hôpital.

translation.en: First of all, that cab was huge.
And a jury decided that one night of pain was worth $200,000.
translation.fr:
Secundo, un jury a décidé
qu'une nuit, ça valait 200 000 $.

translation.en: -So there you go. -Whatever.
Why are you being so nuts to me lately?
You refuse to move on to the next phase.
I'd like to have a family someday.
I need someone I can rely on, not a playmate.
translation.fr: Je veux quelqu'un sur qui compter.

translation.en: You need a father figure? "Stop pulling your sister's hair!"
translation.fr:
Tu veux l'image du père :
"Laisse ta sœur !"

translation.en: You know what? I'm gonna go to Syracuse to see my mom.
translation.fr:
Tu sais quoi ?
Je vais voir ma mère, à Syracuse.

translation.en: -I'll be back on Wednesday. -What are you talking about?
translation.fr:
- Je reviens mercredi.
- De quoi tu parles ?

translation.en: I had call for delivery, but it was crank call. You want chocolate cake?
translation.fr:
J'ai eu une livraison bidon.
Tu veux du gâteau au chocolat ?

translation.en: Come back later. I'll Indian wrestle you.
translation.fr:
Reviens plus tard.
On fera de la lutte.

translation.en: You're going down, sucker.
We'll see about that.
Okay. Peace, out.
You're going to Syracuse?
I need time to think and so do you.
Think about what?
Your life and why I should be a part of it.
translation.fr: A la place que j'occupe dans ta vie.

translation.en: -All right. -While you're at it...
translation.fr:
D'accord. Pendant que tu y es,
trouve-toi un vrai boulot.

translation.en: ...think about getting a real job.
translation.fr:
Pendant que tu y es,
trouve-toi un vrai boulot.

translation.en: I got a real job!
Patrick Ewing, nice shot.
-Hey, Sonny. -What's up, buddy boy?
translation.fr:
- Salut, Sonny.
- Ça va, mon pote ?

translation.en: I'm out the door. Hey, pal.
-Where you going? -Manhattan.
You wanna take me with you?
All right, I guess.
Hold on to your money. Later on.
Cadillac, I love it.
Surprise!
Just ignore him.
It's only Sonny. It's only Sonny.
Yeah, it's only me. It's only me.
-What's going on? -Corinne's going-away party for Kevin.
translation.fr:
- C'est quoi ?
- Corinne reçoit pour Kevin.

translation.en: She didn't tell me. The roommate has a right to know.
translation.fr:
Et elle me le dit pas ?
J'habite aussi ici.

translation.en: She knew you'd ruin the surprise.
translation.fr: Elle craignait que tu lui dises.

translation.en: No, I wouldn't.
What's going on?
We wasted the good surprise on you.
All right.
Is this your handiwork?
I guess.
See you in three hours.
Good to see you stiffs. What've you been doing?
translation.fr: Alors, les coincés. Quoi de neuf ?

translation.en: Last three weeks have been crazy. I've been in Denver, Dallas--
translation.fr:
J'ai eu un boulot dingue ces temps-ci,
Denver, Dallas...

translation.en: I'm sleeping in the office. We're going to trial on the fraud case.
translation.fr:
Moi, je dors au bureau.
On plaide une fraude sur titres.

translation.en: Honey, it was a great surprise. I was totally shocked.
No, you weren't! And I worked so hard on this.
translation.fr:
Non, après tout le mal
que je me suis donnée.

translation.en: Need some help?
-Honey, your sister's here. -Hey, sweetie.
I hate Sonny.
My client's out $7 million. All we can sue on is breach of contract.
translation.fr:
Mon client perd 7 millions.
A part rupture de contrat...

translation.en: Maybe you can sue under the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act.
translation.fr:
Tu peux plaider la corruption
de fonctionnaires.

translation.en: I gotta get back to the office. You're the king.
translation.fr:
Je dois retourner au bureau.
T'es le roi.

translation.en: Mikey, a pleasure.
-I'll see you at home. -All right.
translation.fr:
- On se voit à la maison.
- Oui.

translation.en: I'll walk you out.
I gotta admit, I'm still weirded out when they kiss.
translation.fr:
J'avoue que je ne m'y fais
toujours pas.

translation.en: Why? They're gay. That's what gay guys do.
translation.fr: Pourquoi ? lls font ça, les gays.

translation.en: I know, but they were like brothers to us back in school.
translation.fr:
Je sais, mais c'était un peu
nos frangins, à la fac.

translation.en: They're still like our brothers. Our very, very gay brothers.
translation.fr:
Ils le sont toujours :
mais des frangins gay.

translation.en: What are you doing after this? Going to a Klan meeting?
translation.fr:
Tu fais quoi, après ?
Une réunion du Klan ?

translation.en: Remember when Dad had that barbecue... ...for his friends and it rained...
translation.fr:
Tu te souviens du barbecue
où il pleuvait,

translation.en: ...so he and Mom went into the kitchen and made...
...100 hamburgers with one frying pan?
translation.fr:
une centaine de hamburgers
avec une poêle ?

translation.en: You're not gonna let a little rain stop you from making 100 hamburgers.
translation.fr:
C'est pas un contretemps
de rien du tout qui va t'arrêter, si ?

translation.en: That relationship's lasted longer than I thought it would.
translation.fr:
J'aurais jamais cru
que ça tiendrait.

translation.en: Look at his eyes. He's bored. I give it two more weeks.
translation.fr:
Mais il s'emmerde.
Je leur donne deux semaines.

translation.en: Hey, excuse me. Everybody!
I'm sorry. I wanted to thank you for coming tonight.
translation.fr:
Je vous remercie
d'être tous là ce soir.

translation.en: I guess I should say--
I'm getting it. Tomorrow I'm leaving for China...
translation.fr:
Je progresse. Demain, je pars pour la Chine,
représenter Morton et Mandel.

translation.en: ...to represent the firm of Morton and Mandel.
translation.fr:
Demain, je pars pour la Chine,
représenter Morton et Mandel.

translation.en: Me, the same guy who once shaved his ass to win a $5 bet.
translation.fr:
Moi, qui me suis rasé
les fesses pour 5 $.

translation.en: Prove it!
Just kidding.
But I am real glad you're all here tonight, because...
translation.fr:
Non, je suis heureux
que vous soyez là, car

translation.en: ...I'm gonna do what I never thought I'd have the guts to do.
translation.fr:
je vais faire un truc
que je n'aurais jamais osé faire.

translation.en: You're not proposing, are you?
-Yeah, pal, I am. -Well, think about it, you know?
God, Sonny, shut up!
Anyway, will you?
translation.fr: Quoi qu'il en soit, tu dis oui ?

translation.en: Good call on the two weeks.
Sonny, what was that all about?
Congratulations. You and Big Boobs McGee are gonna be happy.
translation.fr:
Bravo. Méga lolos et toi
serez très heureux.

translation.en: Don't call her that.
You wanna tell your children you met their mother as a waitress at Hooters?
translation.fr:
Tu raconteras à tes gosses
que t'as connu leur mère en string.

translation.en: Sonny, that was five years ago. She's a doctor now...
translation.fr:
C'était il y a cinq ans.
Elle est médecin,

translation.en: ...and my fiancée, so from now on...
translation.fr:
c'est ma fiancée,
donc tu dis

translation.en: ...Dr. Big Boobs McGee.
-Congratulations. -Thanks, man.
I just...
...got shit going on.
What's the matter?
Vanessa's gonna break up with me...
...and I don't know how to make her wanna stay.
translation.fr:
et je ne sais que faire
pour la garder.

translation.en: She's getting older. She wants different things.
translation.fr:
Elle mûrit.
Elle veut se ranger.

translation.en: Career, stable relationship, a family.
translation.fr:
Elle veut une carrière,
fonder une famille.

translation.en: That's how they get.
I want things to go back to the way they used to be.
translation.fr:
J'aimerais que tout
redevienne comme avant.

translation.en: When we were at Syracuse, and Vanessa worshiped you.
translation.fr:
Comme à Syracuse.
Où elle t'idolâtrait.

translation.en: -That was nice. -Nobody hassled you to get a job.
translation.fr:
- C'était bien.
- On ne t'embêtait pas.

translation.en: Tommy and Phil showered separately.
translation.fr:
Tommy et Phil
faisaient douche à part.

translation.en: Those were the days.
-What're you doing? -If I make this...
...Vanessa will realize she likes me the way I am.
translation.fr: elle me voudra comme je suis.

translation.en: You're going to the putt.
Remember, the roof breaks to the right.
translation.fr: Gaffe, le toit part à droite.

translation.en: Yes! That's what I'm talk--
Good God!
That can't be good.
Where's Kevin?
He already left. I guess he forgot to say goodbye to you.
translation.fr:
Il est déjà parti. Il a dû oublier
de te dire au revoir.

translation.en: -Why are you here? -I'm cleaning because you're useless.
translation.fr:
- Tu fais quoi ?
- Le ménage, tu es trop nul.

translation.en: Then what, you gonna go to your Hooters reunion?
translation.fr: Après, tu vas à ton bar à nichons ?

translation.en: You guys talk about whose ass hangs out of their shorts the most?
translation.fr:
Vous allez comparer
qui a le short le plus court ?

translation.en: At least I can fit my ass in my shorts, fatty.
translation.fr: Au moins, j'entre dedans, gros lard.

translation.en: Speaking of fatty, whose is this?
-I don't know. -I'm eating it then.
translation.fr:
- Aucune idée.
- Alors, c'est à moi.

translation.en: "We wasted the good surprise on you."
Lady gave me $5 to bring him here.
-What do you mean? -Later.
Are you selling raffle tickets?
-Kevin Gerrity. -I got something to tell you.
-What's up? -There's a kid here.
What kind of kid?
If this note is true, it's your kid.
translation.fr:
Si cette lettre dit vrai,
le tien.

translation.en: What do you mean?
I'm having a tough time reading this...
translation.fr: J'ai un peu de mal à lire,

translation.en: ...but it says, "Dear Kevin: This is Julian, your son.
translation.fr:
mais ça dit :
"Kevin, voici Julian, ton fils.

translation.en: I hope you understand why I didn't tell you until now...
translation.fr: Je ne t'en avais jamais parlé,

translation.en: ...but he needs your help. I can't be his mother anymore."
translation.fr:
mais il a besoin de toi.
Je ne peux plus être sa mère."

translation.en: -This is ridiculous. -Hang on.
Who's this?
This is my friend.
-Is that Kevin on the phone? -No, it's my Uncle Remus.
translation.fr:
- C'est Kevin au téléphone ?
- Non, c'est mon oncle Remus.

translation.en: Hi. What's your name?
Is he all right?
He doesn't like you. Leave us alone.
You're such a dick.
That was your girlfriend. She was acting "Hooterific."
translation.fr:
C'était ta petite amie,
qui faisait son show.

translation.en: -Who sent that note? -"Jan."
Jan.... I don't know any Jan.
translation.fr:
Jan...
Je ne connais aucune Jan.

translation.en: -Where's he from? -Where are you from?
translation.fr:
- Il est d'où ?
- Tu es d'où ?

translation.en: Buffalo.
I've never even been to Buffalo.
translation.fr:
J'y suis jamais allé.
C'est une blague.

translation.en: Maybe it's a mistake.
translation.fr:
J'y suis jamais allé.
C'est une blague. Ou une erreur.

translation.en: Is this like the time you said my parents were dead?
translation.fr:
Il est vraiment là,
ou tu te fous de moi ?

translation.en: I swear, he's right here.
translation.fr: Je te jure qu'il y est.

translation.en: I'm coming home. I don't know what I'll say--
translation.fr:
Je rentre.
J'ignore ce que je vais dire...

translation.en: Hang on. It says...
..."If you won't take responsibility for him, they found a foster family--"
translation.fr:
"Si tu refuses de le prendre,
il y a une famille d'accueil..."

translation.en: Yes, Uncle Remus, I know the catfish are huge.
translation.fr:
Oui, tonton. Ils sont très gros,
tes poissons.

translation.en: That's terrific.
Here's a number for a guy...
...at City Social Service. Arthur Brooks. I'll call.
translation.fr:
un gars de l'aide sociale,
Arthur Brooks.

translation.en: -I'll come home. -I'll take care of it.
Are you sure?
Yeah, don't worry.
-All right. Thanks a lot. -Later.
I'm gonna make another phone call.
translation.fr: Juste un autre coup de fil.

translation.en: You want to come and sit down, pal?
translation.fr: Tu veux pas t'asseoir, mon pote ?

translation.en: Or you can stand there. Anything you want. I'll be a minute.
translation.fr:
Ou tu peux rester là.
C'est comme tu le sens.

translation.en: Social Services is closed today, Columbus Day.
translation.fr: Le bureau d'aide sociale est fermé.

translation.en: We'll be open tomorrow at 8 a.m.
translation.fr:
Rappelez demain,
à partir de 8 h.

translation.en: Columbus Day.
Boy, I don't know what to tell you.
translation.fr: Je sais pas quoi te dire.

translation.en: Everything's gonna get figured out tomorrow.
translation.fr: Demain, ça sera une affaire réglée.

translation.en: Can you be a tough little guy until then?
translation.fr:
Tu peux jouer les durs,
jusque-là ?

translation.en: Great.
Do I need to get you a bottle of formula or something?
translation.fr:
Faut que je te trouve
un biberon ou quoi ?

translation.en: -No. -What do you eat?
translation.fr:
Faut que je te trouve
un biberon ou quoi ? Tu manges quoi ?

translation.en: Food.
Yeah? I eat food too.
What--? Come on.
You need me to hold your hand?
On Mondays, I go to Central Park and watch rollerbladers fall down.
translation.fr:
Le lundi, je vais à Central Park
voir les patineurs tomber.

translation.en: -You into that? -I don't know.
translation.fr:
- Ça te branche ?
- Je sais pas.

translation.en: Watch. This guy's humming.
translation.fr: Il va à fond la caisse.

translation.en: He's going down, he's going down, he's going--!
translation.fr: Il va se ramasser, il y a droit...

translation.en: How old are you, anyways?
-Five. -Five?
You wear a diaper?
-You wipe your own ass then? -Yes.
translation.fr:
- Tu te torches tout seul ?
- Oui.

translation.en: You do? Good job. That's cool.
Come on, fall down. Fall down. Yes! Come on, damn it.
translation.fr:
Etale-toi, allez...
Dommage, ça a failli.

translation.en: You suck. You suck!
Check this out.
There's a stick there. Somebody should move it.
translation.fr:
Il y a une branche.
Faudrait qu'on la vire.

translation.en: All right now, what way would you put that on?
translation.fr:
Alors, ça se fixe comment,
ce truc-là ?

translation.en: This Columbo, he pretends to be stupid...
translation.fr: Ce Columbo, on le croit débile,

translation.en: ...but he's really smart as a tack.
Oh, yeah, he is.
You put the vane on down there. Then this boat comes up.
translation.fr:
Si on passe ce machin-là
de ce côté-là...

translation.en: I wipe my own ass.
Me too.
So, Mr. Ass Wiper, what's this guy's name?
translation.fr:
Alors, M. Le Torcheur,
c'est qui, lui ?

translation.en: Scuba Steve.
Does he ever take his flippers off?
What if he goes bowling?
They don't make him wear bowling shoes? He wears flippers?
translation.fr:
Pas de chaussures ?
Il les garde ?

translation.en: -Really? -I had a doll like that at one time.
But my cat, he bite his head off.
translation.fr:
Mais mon chat
lui a arraché la tête.

translation.en: What cat would do that?
You calling me a liar?
Hey, take it easy.
...Jets are playing tonight.
translation.fr: Il y a un match, ce soir.

translation.en: We're gonna go to the Blarney Stone. Wanna come?
translation.fr:
On va au Blarney Stone.
Tu veux venir ?

translation.en: I've got more deliveries.
Maybe you can also finish the turkey on your lip.
translation.fr:
Finis donc aussi la dinde,
sur ta lèvre.

translation.en: Right there.
Let's crank up the Styx.
No music during the game.
-It's halftime. Relax, Mr. Herlihy. -Goddamn Jets.
translation.fr:
- On se calme M. Herlihy.
- Satanés Jets.

translation.en: What are you doing in here, cutie?
Watching football.
-Who do you want to win? -The goddamn Jets.
translation.fr:
- Pour qui tu es ?
- Les satanés Jets.

translation.en: Have fun.
Too bad you don't like girls. I think you could've had her.
translation.fr: Dommage que t'aimes pas les filles.

translation.en: -I'm thirsty. -You're thirsty?
-Are you allowed soda? -I don't know.
translation.fr: Tu as droit au soda ? Je sais pas.

translation.en: My mom always said soda rots your teeth...
...but you'll lose them anyway, so rot on.
-Can we get two root beers? -Sure.
When I graduated law school, we met here every Monday to watch football.
translation.fr:
Quand j'étais à la fac,
on venait ici tous les lundis soirs.

translation.en: Who would meet you?
My friends, Vanessa.
Vanessa always rooted against the team... ...I wanted to win just to bust my chops.
translation.fr:
Elle était toujours contre mon équipe
favorite, pour m'embêter.

translation.en: But everybody's so busy with their crap lately, no one comes.
translation.fr:
Maintenant, ils sont tous
débordés avec des conneries.

translation.en: Like I'm not busy?
Shut up or I'll smack you through the wall like last Monday.
translation.fr:
Je vous envoie contre le mur,
comme lundi dernier ?

translation.en: Last Monday was a fluke. Bring it on, woman.
translation.fr:
Tu as eu du pot.
Amène-toi, femmelette.

translation.en: Anytime.
He drinks a lot of soda.
I'm telling you, buddy. Vanessa, she's the one. I can't lose her.
translation.fr:
Vanessa est la femme de ma vie.
Faut pas que je la perde.

translation.en: I'm not getting any handsomer.
Every day I get a little bit older and balder and fatter.
translation.fr:
Je deviens de plus en plus vieux,
chauve et gras.

translation.en: -Fatter? -At your age...
translation.fr:
Gras ? A ton âge, je pouvais avaler
ce que je voulais.

translation.en: ...I could eat anything. Wouldn't gain an ounce.
translation.fr:
A ton âge, je pouvais avaler
ce que je voulais.

translation.en: Now, I have a chocolate shake, my ass jiggles for a week.
translation.fr:
Maintenant, un milk-shake,
et mes miches tremblent.

translation.en: -Enjoy the metabolism while you got it. -Metalobism?
translation.fr:
- Profite bien de ton métabolisme.
- Métalobisme ?

translation.en: Good God, it's 2:30 in the morning. You must be wrecked.
translation.fr:
Il est 2h30 du matin.
Tu dois être nase.

translation.en: Anyways, I had fun today. Did you have fun?
translation.fr:
Enfin. Je me suis bien marré
aujourd'hui. Et toi ?

translation.en: Yeah, you're all right.
Have a good one.
Could I have a night-light?
Night-light? I think I can help you out. Hang on.
translation.fr:
Une veilleuse ? Je te trouve ça.
Une minute.

translation.en: There you go, all right?
Are you my dad?
No, I'm not, but...
...that Dad and Mom thing we'll figure out in the morning.
translation.fr:
mais le plan papa-maman,
on réglera ça demain.

translation.en: You just go to sleep.
Go get the can, okay?
Go! Go! Go!
I'm thinking about keeping the kid.
translation.fr: Je le garderais bien, ce petit.

translation.en: Remember when we went to the pet store...
...and you wanted that puppy, but I reminded you about feeding it...
translation.fr:
tu voulais un chiot,
je t'ai dit qu'il fallait le nourrir,

translation.en: ...cleaning it and toilet training it?
This is kind of like that, except with a human.
translation.fr:
Là, c'est pareil,
mais avec un être humain.

translation.en: I mean, I'm glad you had fun and all, but this is big.
translation.fr:
Tu t'es bien éclaté,
mais là, c'est pas rien.

translation.en: I gotta do something big. I think Vanessa will respect that.
translation.fr:
C'est ce que je veux.
Vanessa respectera ça.

translation.en: You think that since women get pregnant... ...to fix a troubled relationship...
translation.fr:
Des femmes tombent enceintes
quand l'idylle tourne au vinaigre,

translation.en: ...why can't a guy adopt a kid to do the same?
translation.fr:
alors tu veux faire pareil
en adoptant.

translation.en: I didn't think of it like that. But yes, that's what I'm thinking.
translation.fr:
J'y avais pas pensé,
mais c'est bien ce que je pense.

translation.en: Sounds nuts to me, pal. Do yourself a favor. Sleep on it.
translation.fr:
C'est dingue. T'emballe pas.
La nuit porte conseil.

translation.en: You're right. Can I use your phone?
Arthur Brooks speaking.
How you doing? Kevin Gerrity.
Right on, Mr. Gerrity. We were expecting you.
Do you still got a foster family lined up for Julian?
translation.fr:
Vous avez
une famille d'accueil, pour Julian ?

translation.en: Yes, we do.
I've decided to take care of the little guy.
translation.fr:
J'ai décidé de prendre
le petit en charge.

translation.en: Way to sleep on it, pal.

C'est à une douzaine de rues.

Let me do it.
You loop it, you swoop it, and you pull.
You loop it, you swoop it, you pull.

ont toujours eu

It's not your problem? All right.

And we're off.
That's not too difficult, right?
And we're both losing weight.

Bien joué. On va pas louper
le petit-déj'. Allez.

translation.en: Put it away.
-Thanks, anyways. -Sure thing. Anytime.

- Merci quand même.
- De rien. A votre service.

translation.en: Move your ass there, pee-boy.
We only got five minutes, five minutes. Now four.

Il nous reste que cinq minutes.
Plus que quatre.

Dis, monsieur.
Pourquoi tu es par terre ?

moi, c'était plutôt la vogue
Champignons magiques.

J'avais pas la cote d'enfer,
au lycée,

-One day it clicked. -Hey, yappy.

Abrège, et tu as
un œuf McMuffin.

translation.en: How about a Sausage McMuffin with hash browns?
You got a deal.
Look, look. He fell asleep. Let's go.
Sausage McMuffin.

-What do you want? -Cheerios.
They don't got Cheerios.
Lasagna.

Ça va pas ?
Une saucisse et deux crêpes.

We're four seconds late.
You're 30 minutes and four seconds late. Breakfast stops at 10:30.

30 minutes et quatre secondes.
On arrête à 10h30.

Don't cry. Sorry.

T'es qui ? Mon psy ?

Will somebody get the kid a Happy Meal?!

Where's my Egg McMuffin?
Breakfast is over at 10:30.
-Really? I thought it was 11. -I thought that too.

- Je croyais que c'était 11 h.
- Moi aussi.

translation.en: Total mind blower.
Will you just relax? Here.
What do you want me to do?
You're gonna meet Vanessa tonight. You'll like her.
translation.fr:
Tu vas rencontrer Vanessa.
Elle est sympa.

translation.en: You think that's funny?
Good. No more crying.
Are you okay?
Next time, kill me.
Let's do it, Rangers.
--Rangers against the Tampa Bay Lightning.
And at this stage...
...it's as close as you can get to a must-win game for the Rangers.
translation.fr:
il est impératif pour les Rangers
de gagner ce match

translation.en: Or they'll fall behind--
-How you doing? -How you doing?
-You like hockey? -You like hockey?
translation.fr: T'aimes le hockey ? T'aimes le hockey ?

translation.en: This is a big, important game.
This is a big, important game.
-Cut the crap. -Cut the crap.
I'm serious. Don't do that.
How much wood would a woodchuck chuck... ...if a woodchuck could chuck wood?

Les chaussettes de l'archiduchesse
sont-elles sèches ?

translation.en: That's what I thought. Shut up.
Don't you take naps?
Sometimes.
Go take a nap.
I'm too hungry to sleep.
You want some food?
Having a kid is great...

à condition qu'il dorme,
qu'il bouge pas et ne parle pas.

translation.en: He's taken down! Penalty shot!

Why don't you go back sleepy? Sleepy.
Keep napping. What's this?
Kangaroo song.

Ils jouent les arrêts de jeu.
Ils vont tirer un penalty.

Kangaroo song. Kangaroo song!
All right!
God! You were normal yesterday.
I can't take this. Are you serious?
Come and play
What do you say?
Douche-bag kangaroo.
Are you all hopped out?
I don't know what to do. Hopefully Vanessa will.

Elle est sûrement rentrée.
Sinon, on l'attendra.

Oh, God. You don't have to pee, do you?

Tu as pas envie

translation.en: -Do you swear? -I swear.

- Tu le jures ?
- Je le jure.

Elle sera très importante

See these right here? These are magic sunglasses, okay?

Tu vois ça ?

Sonny, I'm right here.

Garde-les. Et personne te verra,

Okay, all right, the glasses.
Welcome back.

- Ravi de te voir.

Je comprends pas trop

- Si on se...

- Avant que...

Come here, pal.

je voudrais te présenter

Is someone in the bathroom?

Tu ramènes un enfant

- je veux pas ça.

Mathusalem,

quand ce corps blanc,
gras, ridé

Gross.

Pull.

nous le prendrons.

Congratulations, kid.

- Je vais appeler le...

On fait

- Appel en P.C.V. de :

Kind of adopted a kid.

J'ai essayé de le rendre.

Vanessa m'a plaqué.

Plus de vie privée.

Attends, je t'économise

translation.en: Let's eat.
The Vanessa thing did not work out.
She lost her damn mind. That wasn't your fault, though, okay?

Elle a perdu la boule.
C'est pas ta faute, tu piges ?

translation.en: I know when you first got here... ...you thought you were gonna meet your dad.

Je sais que quand tu es arrivé,

Les vrais papas,

C'était sûrement un brave type.

Let it go. He can't control you anymore.
What do you mean?

Tu en veux à ton père.
Je te pardonne.

translation.en: I am. I am. I hate my father.

Oui, je le déteste.

translation.en: I don't want it to be like that. I don't wanna control you.

Je veux pas que ça se passe.
Je veux pas te contrôler.

translation.en: -You even like your name? -I guess.

translation.en: What do you want?
Frankenstein.
I can deal with that. I'll call you Frankenstein.

J'ai rien contre.

translation.en: Frankenstein, you gonna play in the puddle?

translation.en: Go ahead. From now on, you do whatever you wanna do.

Vas-y. Désormais,
tu fais ce que tu veux.

translation.en: I'll show you some cool shit along the way.
That's what it's all about.
Stay in front of it. Don't be scared.
translation.fr:
Face à la balle.
N'aie pas peur.

translation.en: It's coming right at you.

translation.en: Is this okay?

translation.fr: C'est ça que tu veux mettre ?

translation.en: That's okay with me then.

translation.fr: Bonne chance, une fois dans la rue.

translation.en: Way to block it. Stay with it.
You're the next Willie Randolph.
translation.fr: Tu seras une star du base-ball.

translation.en: Chief Jay Strongbow used to do a sleeper hold.
translation.fr:
Jay Strongbow faisait
la prise du dormeur.

translation.en: Put your arm under here.
Lift this arm, okay? Slide under and try to lock wrists.
translation.fr:
Lève-lui le bras. Tu passes dessous,
tu bloques ton poignet.

translation.en: Let me show you. Watch.
Throw him into the ropes and he comes back....
Get him. Get him. Lock him up.
Lock wrists.
You bring him down slow.
translation.fr: Et tu le mets à terre.

translation.en: Apply pressure.
He's going to sleep now.
See, he's out.

et que tu m'as dit que c'était
de l'origan.

translation.en: Remember when I told you Aunt Fay was coming to New York...
translation.fr:
Et quand ta tante Fay
est venue à New York,

translation.en: ...and I wanted you to show her the city?
translation.fr:
tu devais lui faire
visiter la ville ?

translation.en: And you said that you had better things to do.
translation.fr: Tu as dit que tu avais mieux à faire.

translation.en: That's right.
I'm curious. Just what were those better things that you had to do?
translation.fr:
Je suis curieux. Dis-moi ce que
tu avais de mieux à faire ?

translation.en: Jethro Tull had a reunion concert in New Jersey, so I caught that.
translation.fr:
Jethro Tull donnait un concert
dans le New Jersey, j'ai foncé.

translation.en: What happened to Aunt Fay that weekend?
translation.fr: Et qu'est-il arrivé à ta tante ?

translation.en: She died.
Yes, she did.
Did you happen to make it to her funeral?
translation.fr:
Etais-tu, par hasard,
à ses obsèques ?

translation.en: -Why not? -I went to Jones Beach...
translation.fr:
Pourquoi non ? Je suis allé au zanzibar,
j'ai picolé, j'ai dormi.

translation.en: ...got drunk and fell asleep.
translation.fr:
Je suis allé au zanzibar,
j'ai picolé, j'ai dormi.

translation.en: Hell, yes!
Some role model.
Your Honor...
...my son doesn't have health insurance.
He doesn't know how to boil an egg.
He filed for social security at the age of 30.
translation.fr:
Il a demandé sa préretraite
à l'âge de 30 ans.

translation.en: He is a drain on the economy, on the country...
translation.fr:
C'est un fardeau pour tous,
pour la nation,

translation.en: ...and most of all, on me!
Your Honor, to give this young man...
translation.fr: Mme la présidente, donner à ce jeune homme,

translation.en: ...custody over another life is not only wrong...
translation.fr:
la garde d'un enfant,
serait non seulement une faute,

translation.en: ...it's insane.
Hey. I love you.
-What? -Don't be scared. It's all right.
I'm not scared.
If I get custody of Julian, I'll be his father forever.
translation.fr:
Si j'ai la garde de Julian,
je serai son père.

translation.en: That scares you because you think there's a good chance I'll fail.
translation.fr:
C'est ça qui t'angoisse,
que je risque de me planter.

translation.en: Sonny, it's more than a chance. It's a certainty.
translation.fr:
Sonny, c'est plus qu'un risque.
C'est une certitude.

translation.en: You're wrong, Dad.
You can be scared that I might get pickpocketed in a bad neighborhood...
translation.fr:
Tu peux t'angoisser à l'idée
qu'on me pique mon portefeuille,

translation.en: ...or break my legs skiing.
translation.fr: ou que je me casse la jambe.

translation.en: But don't be scared about me being a dad, because I will not fail.
translation.fr:
Mais pas que je devienne père,
car je n'échouerai pas.

translation.en: I love this kid too much.
I love him as much as you love me, Dad.
translation.fr: Je l'aime autant que tu m'aimes.

translation.en: I'm gonna give him advice and I'm gonna guide him...
translation.fr:
Je le conseillerai,
je le guiderai

translation.en: ...and I'll be there whenever he needs me.
translation.fr: autant qu'il aura besoin de moi.

translation.en: I'll fly to New York to be at his court case...
...even if I disagree with why he's there.
translation.fr: même si je suis contre le principe.

translation.en: But, Sonny, you work in a tollbooth.
translation.fr: Mais tu travailles à un poste de péage.

translation.en: Don't worry about money.
I am in love with a beautiful girl who makes plenty of it.
translation.fr:
J'aime une fille sublime
qui gagne un max.

translation.en: She'll be my sugar mama.
I gotta get me one of those.
I know this is the right thing because I would die for this kid...
translation.fr:
Je suis sûr de mon choix.
Je mourrais pour cet enfant,

translation.en: ...just so he won't feel one ounce of sadness.
translation.fr:
pour lui éviter
un instant de chagrin.

translation.en: That's why you're here right now, to protect me, to be scared for me...
translation.fr:
C'est pour ça que tu es venu,
pour me protéger, pour t'angoisser,

translation.en: ...to be a good father.
translation.fr: et pour être un bon père.

translation.en: And that's exactly what I'm gonna be.
translation.fr: Et c'est ce que je serai.

translation.en: Hello, Dad?
Yeah, I just wanted to say I love you.
translation.fr:
Juste pour te dire
que je t'aime.

translation.en: Hi, Mom? Could you put Dad on the phone for a second?
translation.fr:
Allô, maman ?
Tu pourrais me passer papa ?

translation.en: Can I borrow that when you're done?
Your Honor...
...my son deserves this kid.
I love you too, sir.
Mr. Koufax...
...the fact is you kidnapped this child.
translation.fr:
le fait est que
vous avez enlevé cet enfant.

translation.en: Not only shouldn't you get custody...
translation.fr: Vous ne méritez pas sa garde,

translation.en: ...but since you obtained him by defrauding the state...
translation.fr:
et comme vous l'avez eu
en trompant l'Etat,

translation.en: ...you should be in jail.
Bailiff, remand him until I can figure out the punishment.
translation.fr:
Huissier, mettez-le en détention
jusqu'au verdict.

translation.en: Wait. You can't take him away.
translation.fr: Ne le mettez pas en prison.

translation.en: As that boy's father, I refuse to press charges.
translation.fr:
Moi, le père,
je refuse de porter plainte.

translation.en: Oh, God. Corinne, I'm sorry.
Six years ago, Joe Carter....
translation.fr: Il y a six ans, Joe Carter...

translation.en: Joe Carter?
Toronto and the Phillies. World Series.
Mitch Williams-- We flew up for the night.
translation.fr:
Mitch Williams...
On y est allé.

translation.en: -There was a girl. -Oh, God.
I'm an idiot. I was so hammered.
translation.fr:
Je suis stupide.
J'étais ivre mort.

translation.en: Chicken wings, Molson 3-0. Canadian beer is like moonshine.
translation.fr:
Ça défonce grave,
la bière canadienne.

translation.en: Hell, yes.
You remember? It was at that Toronto Hooters.
translation.fr:
Tu te souviens ?
Ce bar, à Toronto.

translation.en: That was before he met you. That Hooters thing is a coincidence.
translation.fr:
C'était avant de te rencontrer.
C'était une coïncidence.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Corinne.
I know this changes everything, but I had to do the right thing.
translation.fr:
Je sais que ça change nos projets,
mais je devais le faire.

translation.en: Mr. Castellucci.
Pending a blood test, I....
Whatever.
The court grants custody to Kevin Gerrity, pending the DNA test results.
translation.fr:
La garde est accordée à Kevin Gerrity
jusqu'aux résultats des tests ADN.

translation.en: I want you to be my dad, Sonny.
translation.fr:
Je veux que tu sois mon papa,
Sonny.

translation.en: I know. I do too, pal.
But I'm not sure that can happen exactly the way we want it.
translation.fr:
Mais je ne suis pas sûr que
ça se passe tout à fait comme ça.

translation.en: Because it seems you already have a daddy.
translation.fr:
Il semble
que tu aies déjà un papa.

translation.en: But I'll tell you what I can do.
translation.fr: Mais je te propose un truc.

translation.en: I can be your friend, no matter what. All right?
translation.fr:
Je serai ton ami, quoi qu'il arrive.
D'accord ?

translation.en: I'll always be your friend.
I'll always be your family. I'll always be around.
translation.fr:
Je serai ta famille.
Je serai toujours là.

translation.en: I promise.
The kid's good at tying his shoes.
He's not great at it, so work with him.
-I'll teach him bunny ears. -What's bunny ears?
translation.fr:
- Je lui apprendrai le lapin.
- Quoi ?

translation.en: Make bunny ears, cross and pull them through.
translation.fr:
Deux oreilles,
tu croises, tu tires.

translation.en: I go with this loop, swoop and pull thing. He likes that.
translation.fr:
Ma méthode, c'est boucle, tour,
tu tires. Il adore.

translation.en: -I don't know that. -Go with the loop, swoop and pull.
I swear to God it's working.
All right.
Go with the bunny ears thing. You're his dad, right? I'm sorry.
translation.fr:
Essaye le plan lapin.
C'est toi le père. Excuse-moi.

translation.en: It's important, when you eat at my restaurant...
...you never order BLT.
You must trust me. Stay away from BLT, okay?
translation.fr:
Fuis ça comme la peste,
d'accord ?

translation.en: Hey, guys.
I'm gonna leave you with your dad now, Julian.
translation.fr:
Je te laisse
avec ton père, Julian.

translation.en: He's a good man. I've known him my whole life.
translation.fr:
Il est sympa.
C'est un vieux pote.

translation.en: So you two have fun and I'll see you in the morning.
translation.fr:
Amusez-vous bien.
On se voit demain.

translation.en: All right?
-Quit scaring the kid for a minute. -Who am I scaring?
translation.fr:
- Arrête de faire peur à ce petit.
- Peur à qui ?

translation.en: Bye, pal.
I went to China. Do you know where that is?
translation.fr:
Je reviens de Chine.
Tu connais ?

translation.en: It's in Asia, which is...
...by Europe. I brought some cool stuff back.
Did you move the bench?
That's pretty funny.
You know what I got? Some noisemakers. Check this out.
translation.fr:
J'ai tout plein de pétards.
Vise un peu ça.

translation.en: Wanna try one?
That's my foot!
You're nice man.
I've got Spice Channel. It's blurry but it's nice.
translation.fr:
J'ai le câble.
C'est flou, mais c'est chouette.

translation.en: Let's make this quick. I gotta get to work.
translation.fr:
On traîne pas.
Je dois bosser.

translation.en: Holy shit. Sonny Koufax would rather work than eat.
translation.fr:
On aura tout vu.
Koufax préfère bosser.

translation.en: I'm working on a big case. I gotta sue you for making me come here.
translation.fr:
Je vais vous poursuivre
pour détournement de majeur.

translation.en: Surprise!
Did you just waste the good surprise on me again?
Hi, Corinne.
Happy birthday, Daddy.
How you doing, cutie?
Sonny, I beat you so bad in basketball yesterday.
translation.fr:
Sonny, je t'ai massacré
au basket, hier.

translation.en: From now on, I have to stop letting you win.
translation.fr:
Maintenant,
je ne te laisse plus gagner.

translation.en: I stopped that months ago. He still wins.
That's because you suck.
translation.fr: Faut dire que tu es nul.

translation.en: Corinne, put a tank top on for old time's sake.
translation.fr:
T'es pas en string,
comme au bon vieux temps ?

translation.en: -What is he talking about, Mommy? -Nothing.
translation.fr:
- C'est quoi ça, maman ?
- C'est rien.

translation.en: -Happy birthday, Sonny. -Thank you.
It's a clock radio.
-Thanks for telling me. -I have to split.
I got deliveries.
Hang out with us. We'll have fun.
No, I can't stay. I'll hang for a little bit.
translation.fr:
Faut que j'y aille...
Bon, je reste un peu.

translation.en: There you go. Come on, let's eat, everybody.
translation.fr: Allez, à table, tout le monde.

translation.en: Hey, you! Still missing that tooth, huh?
translation.fr: Il te manque toujours une dent ?

translation.en: Can we get some fries?
-Vanessa. -Hi, Sonny.
You're a Hooters girl?
What happened to Sid's five-year plan?
translation.fr: Où est passé le plan quinquennal ?

translation.en: How you doing?
-Maybe it's a 10-year plan. -Is that the guy with the old balls?
translation.fr:
- Plan décennal.
- C'est lui, les vieilles balloches ?

translation.en: I think it is.
Come on. I bet they're nice.
You're not supposed to say "balls." Testicles. Okay?
